org.spongepowered.api.event.inventory

Interface InventoryEvent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Event, GameEvent
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BlockInventoryEvent, BrewEvent, BrewingStandBrewEvent, BrewingStandEvent, BulkItemResultEvent, EntityEquipmentChangeEvent, EntityPickUpItemEvent, FurnaceConsumeFuelEvent, FurnaceEvent, FurnaceSmeltItemEvent, HumanEquipmentChangeEvent, HumanPickUpItemEvent, ItemResultEvent, LivingEquipmentChangeEvent, LivingPickUpItemEvent, PlayerEquipmentChangeEvent, PlayerPickUpItemEvent

    public interface InventoryEvent
extends GameEvent
    An InventoryEvent is a GameEvent that involves an Inventory.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Returns the Inventory involved in this event.
